overview: 06th November 2005 - 26th Leverkusen Jazz Days - Leverkusen, Forum  Instrumentation:  Emilio Castillo - tenor saxophone, lead vocals, backing vocals  Larry Braggs - lead vocals  Stephen 'Doc' Kupka - baritone saxophone  Tom Politzer - tenor saxophone  Mike Bogart - trumpet, flugelhorn, backing vocals  Adolpho Acosta - trumpet, flugelhorn  Roger Smith - keyboards, backing Vocals  Jeff Tamelier - guitar, backing vocals  Francis Rocco Prestia - bass David Garibaldi - drums  Soul with a capital S Just enough and too much To say the least your most I got to groove Squib cakes You ought to be having fun Dont change horses in the middle of a stream Soul vaccination Still be diggin on James Brown Youre still a young man Knock yourself out
title: Tower of Power - Leverkusener Jazztage 2005
